actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to express the sense of the Senate concerning the formation by the States of interstate agreements to govern the management of hazardous waste.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Senate that States should negotiate and enter into interstate agreements to govern the management of hazardous waste generated within their borders.

titles.title: A resolution to express the sense of the Senate concerning the formation by the States of interstate agreements to govern the management of hazardous waste.
